name: MGO-ScoreMe
description:
Welcome to MGO - ScoreMe, one of several golf apps created by My Golf Outings to increase your enjoyment in playing golf and managing the bets and scores for your group.

This game fully enables you to play from 2 to 6 players depending on the game you choose and to play full Handicaps or net handicaps off the low player, to start on any hole unless you are playing a Nassau Game.

The player's handicap is automatically updated if you use the GHIN number on the player's database.

You can "Press" the Nassau bet or Increase or Decrease the regular bet at the beginning of each hole. The app lets you go back to any hole and change the score or bet for that hole.

Games are: Skins (with or without carries), Nines, Sixteen, Kansas City 3 Point, Standard Nassau and SixHole Nassau. With any of these games you can also play a side game of "Trash" with selected players or "Skins" while playing Nassau, Nines or Sixteen.
